channel.title: Unrar + Wine Tutorial For Linux CentOS [REP++] ~Imp
channel.description: As the title says, does anyone know how to install unrar and wine on linux centos (my vps ) I tried sudo apt-get install unrar but it gives a error i also tried yum install unrar and it didn't work either.

item.title: Unrar + Wine Tutorial For Linux CentOS [REP++] ~Imp
item.dc:creator: @poepen112 poepen112
item.description:
@poepen112 wrote:

[quote=“Skiire, post:2, topic:435507”]Just download the latest RAR Linux version from rarlab website: http://www.rarlab.com/download.htm

wget http://www.rarlab.com/rar/rarlinux-3.7.1.tar.gz

Then extract the archive using the following command:

gzip -dc rarlinux-3.7.1.tar.gz | tar xf -

Go into the extracted directory, cd rar[/quote]

Thanks
ill try it out now

EDIT:
Err, it says it already excists (dont know how to spell it)
With what command can i extract it?

Read full topic
item.source: Unrar + Wine Tutorial For Linux CentOS [REP++] ~Imp

item.title: Unrar + Wine Tutorial For Linux CentOS [REP++] ~Imp
item.dc:creator: @Skiire Skiire
item.description:
@Skiire wrote:

Just download the latest RAR Linux version from rarlab website: http://www.rarlab.com/download.htm

wget http://www.rarlab.com/rar/rarlinux-3.7.1.tar.gz

Then extract the archive using the following command:

gzip -dc rarlinux-3.7.1.tar.gz | tar xf -

Go into the extracted directory, cd rar

Read full topic
